Class DictionaryManager

public class DictionaryManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class providing functions for managing the dictionary

 void deleteEntry()
          Method deleteEntry Deletes an entry from the dictionary of the specified language.
private  java.lang.Boolean getBoolean()
          Method getBoolean Reads a String from the user and return if it is igual to 'y' or 'Y'.

          Method getLanguage Reads a language from the user and returns it.

 void importDictionary()
          Method importDictionary Imports a dictionary using the class DictionaryImport.
 void manageDictionary()
          Method manageDictionary Choose one of the following options: 1) View a list of existing dictionaries 2) View the contents of a dictionary 3) Search for an entry in a dictionary 4) Add entries to an existing dictionary 5) Create a new dictionary 6) Import a dictionary 7) Delete entries from an existing dictionary 8) Delete a dictionary 9) Quit

Method Detail

manageDictionary

public void manageDictionary()
Method manageDictionary Choose one of the following options: 1) View a list of existing dictionaries 2) View the contents of a dictionary 3) Search for an entry in a dictionary 4) Add entries to an existing dictionary 5) Create a new dictionary 6) Import a dictionary 7) Delete entries from an existing dictionary 8) Delete a dictionary 9) Quit

printDictionary

public void printDictionary()
Method printDictionary Prints the contents of a dictionary.

searchDictionary

public void searchDictionary()
Method searchDictionary Searches for a given entry in a given dictionary.

printDictionaries

public void printDictionaries()
Method printDictionaries Prints a list of all dictionaries available.

addDictionary

public void addDictionary()
Method addDictionary Adds a dictionary of the specified language. Works only if there is no dictionary of this language yet.

importDictionary

public void importDictionary()
Method importDictionary Imports a dictionary using the class DictionaryImport.

deleteDictionary

public void deleteDictionary()
Method deleteDictionary Deletes a dictionary of the specified language.

addEntry

public void addEntry()
Method addEntry Adds an entry to the dictionary of the specified language. Before writing the entries to the DB the entries are analyzed with the MultilingAnalyzer of the language and thus normalized.

deleteEntry

public void deleteEntry()
Method deleteEntry Deletes an entry from the dictionary of the specified language.

printResultSet

private void printResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet result,
                            Language tablename)
Method printResultSet Prints a result set, if it is not empty. After every 25 results the user is asked if he wants to see more.

getNumber

private int getNumber()
Method getNumber Reads a number from the user and returns it. In case of error 0 is given back.

getLanguage

private Language getLanguage()
Method getLanguage Reads a language from the user and returns it. In case of error 'null' is given back.

getString

private java.lang.String getString()
Method getString Reads a String from the user and returns it. In case of error 'null' is given back.

getBoolean

private java.lang.Boolean getBoolean()
Method getBoolean Reads a String from the user and return if it is igual to 'y' or 'Y'. In case of error 'false' is given back.
